item.description:
The first 60 members (including performers) to RSVP gets to attend!
$10 per person at the door - cash only

Second Annual Meetup Talent Show

It was a huge hit last year and people are still talking about it! We're accepting up to ten acts so don't miss this opportunity to be in the audience and be thoroughly entertained!

BE IN THE SHOW!
Performers are allotted 3-7 minutes.
Please submit your request to be in the show to: jackierg@comcast.net
Anything goes (well almost anything). Sing a song, play an instrument, present comedy, read minds, dance, give a speech, act out a skit, juggle, or whatever your talent may be.

Pizza: 5 pm - 6 pm
Show: 6 pm - 8 pm
Socializing: We're going out afterwards to a nearby place (Legends Lounge).

Price includes Pizza, Soda and the Show!

Please park in spaces furthest away from hotel entrance to allow for hotel guests to find easy parking.

STAY OVERNIGHT!
If you are traveling from a distance, consider staying over at this lovely hotel. Our group gets a special rate of only $59 double or single occupancy. Includes breakfast and wifi!
item.name: Fun Stuff's Got Talent!
